title: 2BR Apartment With Loads of Charm!
map_address: 184 South State Street near East South Street
posting_body: Welcome to your new spacious 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment.
You say you really don't need a 2nd bedroom?
Well this is a great price for this 1000 square foot apartment.
And you have so many options for the "2nd" bedroom here - you can of course use it as a bedroom
OR you can use it as an office, library, craft room, game room or walk-in closet!
You also have a full size, eat-in kitchen, a full bathroom, high ceilings, great size bedrooms and closets and a living room with plenty of natural sunlight.
There is attic storage as an added bonus too!
You have your own entrance off of the large, shared front porch that leads to the beautiful wood staircase that takes you up to your apartment.
The spare bedroom and full bath are off of the hallway when you enter and your large, full kitchen and living room are on the other side.
The master bedroom is located conveniently off of the living room and the large windows throughout the apartment let in plenty of light.
Your rent includes trash removal and you are responsible for the heat, electric, water and sewer.
We do also have a parking lot for our residents (guests have street parking).
We do allow up to 2 pet cats OR one small pet dog (no larger than 25 lbs full grown) at list property - however additional fees apply.
If you are interested, just go directly to our website, review our Criteria/Rules and Regulations, watch the virtual tour and apply right online.
If you have additional questions, please feel free to contact our office.
